message: I understand fairness is important, but so is the time value of money.  This offer accounts for the diminishing value over time.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before
Alice, it's clear we both value fairness and recognize the impact of inflation.  This offer is a compromise, aiming to find a middle ground for a mutually beneficial agreement.
Time is on my side, but I'm still willing to compromise
Alice, it seems we're reaching a stalemate. I'm proposing a 50/50 split to end this negotiation fairly.  Further delays will only hurt us both.
